verses.verse: O <S%H4310>that<s%> <S%H5414><s%> thou wast as my <S%H251>brother,<s%> that <S%H3243>sucked<s%> the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of my <S%H517>mother!<s%> when I should <S%H4672>find<s%> thee <S%H2351>without,<s%> I would <S%H5401>kiss<s%> thee; <S%H1571>yea,<s%> I should <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H936>despised.<s%>

I would <S%H5090>lead<s%> thee, and <S%H935>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> who would <S%H3925>instruct<s%> me: I would cause thee to <S%H8248>drink<s%> of <S%H7544>spiced<s%> <S%H4480>wine<s%> <S%H3196><s%> of the <S%H4480>juice<s%> <S%H6071><s%> of my <S%H7416>pomegranate.<s%>
His left <S%H8040>hand<s%> should be <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7218>head,<s%> and his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> should <S%H2263>embrace<s%> me.

I <S%H7650>charge<s%> you, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H4100>that<s%> ye stir not <S%H5782>up,<s%> <S%H4100>nor<s%> <S%H5782>awake<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H7945>please.<s%> <S%H2654><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that cometh <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H7514>leaning<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H1730>beloved?<s%> I raised thee <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the apple <S%H8598>tree:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> thy <S%H517>mother<s%> brought thee <S%H2254>forth:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> she brought thee <S%H2254>forth<s%> that <S%H3205>bore<s%> thee.

Set <S%H7760><s%> me as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> as a <S%H2368>seal<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H2220>arm:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H160>love<s%> is <S%H5794>strong<s%> as <S%H4194>death;<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is <S%H7186>cruel<s%> as the <S%H7585>grave:<s%> the <S%H7565>coals<s%> thereof are <S%H7565>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> which hath a most vehement <S%H7957>flame.<s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> can the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H7857>drown<s%> it: <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> would <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H160>love,<s%> it would utterly be <S%H936>contemned.<s%> <S%H936><s%>

We have a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> and she hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7699>breasts:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for our <S%H269>sister<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when she shall be spoken <S%H7945>for?<s%> <S%H1696><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> be a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> we will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her a <S%H2918>palace<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> be a <S%H1817>door,<s%> we will <S%H6696>enclose<s%> <S%H5921><s%> her with <S%H3871>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am a <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and my <S%H7699>breasts<s%> like <S%H4026>towers:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> I in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as one that <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7965>favor.<s%>

Solomon <S%H8010><s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> at <S%H1174>Baal-hamon;<s%> he let <S%H5414>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> unto <S%H5201>keepers;<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> for the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof was to <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

My <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> which is <S%H7945>mine,<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> me: thou, O <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> must have a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and those that <S%H5201>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
Thou that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens,<s%> the <S%H2270>companions<s%> <S%H7181>hearken<s%> to thy <S%H6963>voice:<s%> cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.

Make <S%H1272>haste,<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> and be thou <S%H1819>like<s%> to a <S%H6643>roe<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to a <S%H6082>young<s%> <S%H354>hart<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1314>spices.<s%>
